title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Best practices for serverless developers (CNS403)
title_cn:
I understand you're referencing an AWS re:Invent 2025 session about serverless best practices. However, I don't have access to the specific content from that session (CNS403) since re:Invent 2025 hasn't occurred yet, and I don't have real-time access to conference materials.

I can help you with general serverless best practices for AWS developers, or if you have specific questions about serverless architectures, Lambda functions, API Gateway, DynamoDB, or other serverless services, I'd be happy to assist with those topics.

What specific serverless development challenges or questions would you like help with?
abstract: Do you want to take advantage of the full power of serverless architectures for your production workloads? Are you wondering how events can help your applications scale? Have you been trying to tune your applications for higher performance and lower cost? This session provides architectural best practices, optimizations, and useful shortcuts that experts can use to build secure, high-scale, and high-performance serverless applications.
abstract_cn: 您想要在生产工作负载中充分利用无服务器架构的全部威力吗？您是否想知道事件如何帮助您的应用程序扩展？您是否一直在尝试调优应用程序以获得更高的性能和更低的成本？本会议提供架构最佳实践、优化方法和实用技巧，专家可以使用这些来构建安全、高扩展性和高性能的无服务器应用程序。
